title: Tax Reform Proposal
description: The court proposes a complete overhaul of the tax collection system to reduce corruption.

title: Silk Route Protection
description: Merchants request military escorts to defend against frequent raids.

title: Smuggler Ambush in the Dunes
description: A convoy was attacked under suspicious circumstances. Some say the guards opened the gates themselves.

visual.tag_ia: desert ambush with broken wagons and masked figures

title: The Forgotten Oath Resurfaces
description: Ancient writings found in a ruined monastery mention a blood pact tied to the northern clans.

visual.tag_ia: ancient scroll glowing in snowy ruins

title: Repel the Invasion
description: Border forces have crossed into the kingdom and must be pushed back.

visual.tag_ia: village militia fighting invaders at dusk

title: Fortify the Villages
description: Local settlements require fortifications to withstand attacks.

visual.tag_ia: workers building wooden palisades in haste

title: Secret Trial
description: A clandestine court is held to judge a captured traitor.

visual.tag_ia: dimly lit chamber with hooded judges

title: Death of the Envoy
description: A trusted envoy is found dead under mysterious circumstances.

visual.tag_ia: envoy lying lifeless in ornate hallway

title: Attack on the Watchtower
description: Enemy forces strike the northern watchtower during the night.

title: Fires on the Border
description: Scouts report enemy fires burning just beyond the treeline. Villagers fear a surprise attack at dawn.

visual.tag_ia: distant campfires glowing near dark forest border

title: Clash of Pride
description: Two rival militia leaders argue over who should lead the defense. Their shouting draws a nervous crowd.

visual.tag_ia: two armored men arguing in lamplit village square

title: Call for Champions
description: Elders urge the bravest to volunteer for a risky border raid, promising honor and spoils.

visual.tag_ia: village elder rallying armed volunteers at dusk
